item.title: Customize Awesome
item.description: ###Wallpaper Setting When switching to big display in awesome, the desktop background will not fill the whole screen, thus we need to automatically set the background when we execute the ./singleview script, ./singleview script is a script which I wrote for switching to big display. Listed as following: killall conky xrandr --output LVDS1 --off xrandr --newmode $(gtf 1680 1050 60 | grep Modeline | sed s/Modeline\ // | tr -d '"') xrandr --addmode VGA1 1680x1050_60.

item.title: Customize Awesome Startup Application
item.description: Let applications automatically start at boot will greatly save your time in configurating the system. Following is some tips on how to automatically start applications in awesome desktop environment. ###Xinit Way My startup configuration is listed as: export GTK_IM_MODULE=fcitx export QT_IM_MODULE=fcitx export XMODIFIERS="@im=fcitx" exec awesome So the awesome environment will be started. ###Awesome Way Run only once in awesome desktop, via following configuration file: function run_once(cmd) findme = cmd firstspace = cmd:find(" ") if firstspace then findme = cmd:sub(0, firstspace-1) end awful.
